item.title: A Look at Zepto Ransomware - Payload Delivery Analysis
item.description: It’s another quiet Friday when we are alerted of bunch of files with the .zepto extension being created all over the place. It seems that a Zepto sample that worked its way through our network. AV was mostly useless and the ransomware managed to encrypt a few thousand files on a particular share. First thing’s first, I need to find all the users actively encrypting files on this share.
